attributes.action: Use his influence to stop the German Government from bullying the Dutch Government to ignore referendum decision NOT to support an EU constitution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The German Governement, particularly and its leader Frau Merkel, is intent on pressurising the Dutch Government into ignoring the referendum result NOT to sign the European Union constituion.  The German government did not dare to ask the Germans their views and cannot accept that other countries might have a more democratic tradition.  Britain should, once again, step in to save democracy in Europe.
